name: Ground Mail - Ascent
description:
Submission to Trijam #107. Theme: Package Delivery!

Controls:

  • ARROW KEYS / D-pad : Move 
  • ENTER / Start : Reset to bottom of tower
  • Z / A : Push Rocks

Embark on the epic quest to deliver a package to the top of a tower, where someone your parents' age awaits to receive their important purchase.

Download the ROM to play on an actual gameboy emulator!

Made using GBStudio

Premade stuff:

  • GBStudio's default font
  • Three different GraphicsGale fonts 

Learned/personal takeaways:

  • How to make a tileset in GraphicsGale and use it with Tiled to make maps.
  • First time using  GBStudio
  • Things take a LOT longer than expected!
